name: Dyson Defense
description:
Made for Blackthornprod Game Jam # 2, created entirely by me.

You are the leader of a futuristic civilization that has built a Dyson sphere around their star to harness its power. The solar system is rapidly approaching a dense asteroid belt and you must build defenses to protect it.

Project is unfinished - missing many sound effects, music, features, balancing and polish.
